item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 9, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenCoder: Open Cookbook for Top-Tier Code Large Language Models (189 points | 32 comments)
2. Show HN: Jaws – a JavaScript to WASM ahead-of-time compiler (101 points | 42 comments)
3. Show HN: Visprex – Open-source, in-browser data visualisation tool for CSV files (11 points | 2 comments)
4. Early Cascade Injection: From Windows process creation to stealthy injection (68 points | 8 comments)
5. NYC Subway Station Layouts (25 points | 7 comments)
6. IronCalc – Open-Source Spreadsheet Engine (125 points | 47 comments)
7. You too can write a book (14 points | 4 comments)
8. Zig's (.{}){} Syntax (54 points | 25 comments)
9. Mergiraf: a syntax-aware merge driver for Git (293 points | 67 comments)
10. Show HN: HTML-to-Markdown – convert entire websites to Markdown with Golang/CLI (221 points | 42 comments)
11. FrontierMath: A benchmark for evaluating advanced mathematical reasoning in AI (17 points | discuss)
12. Scientist treated her own cancer with viruses she grew in the lab (321 points | 137 comments)
13. Texture-Less Text Rendering (161 points | 45 comments)
14. When machine learning tells the wrong story (36 points | 2 comments)
15. Trellis (YC W24) is hiring eng to turn documents into database ( | hide)
16. Somebody moved UK's oldest satellite (49 points | 22 comments)
17. SVDQuant: 4-Bit Quantization Powers 12B Flux on a 16GB 4090 GPU with 3x Speedup (143 points | 48 comments)
18. Obtainium: Get Android App Updates Directly from the Source (138 points | 67 comments)
19. HPV vaccination: How the world can eliminate cervical cancer (268 points | 104 comments)
20. Ticketmaster’s attempt to game arbitration services fails (212 points | 64 comments)
21. Using Two ReMarkables (86 points | 45 comments)
22. A Brief History of Cyrix (57 points | 11 comments)
23. Since the '60s, Ford has stored cars underground in a Kansas City cave (115 points | 37 comments)
24. Memories are not only in the brain, human cell study finds (170 points | 77 comments)
25. The Saturn V FUELDRAULIC Gimbal System (1963) (31 points | 11 comments)
26. Notes on Guyana (90 points | 84 comments)
27. Can humans say the largest prime number before we find the next one? (267 points | 123 comments)
28. Automat: A tangible interface for virtual things (18 points | 2 comments)
29. Cache Directory Tagging Specification (2004) (16 points | 6 comments)
30. Delta: A syntax-highlighting pager for Git, diff, grep, and blame output (552 points | 73 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 9, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
